gboolean dbus_get_session_connection (  DBusGConnection **  connection  ) 
 

Gets the dbus session service, informing user if not found.

Initialize session DBUS conection - this *might* fail as it's potentially the first time the user will use this functionality. If so, tell them how to fix the issue.

Parameters:
connection A valid DBUS connection, passed by ref
Returns:
Success value.

gboolean dbus_get_system_connection (  DBusGConnection **  connection  ) 
 

Gets the dbus session service, informing user if not found.

This *shouldn't* fail as HAL will not work without the system messagebus.

Parameters:
connection A valid DBUS connection, passed by ref
Returns:
Success value.

gboolean dbus_glib_error (  GError *  error  ) 
 

This will warn us if we don't check the return value.

We echo to debug, as we don't want the typical user sending in bug reports. Use --verbose to view these warnings.
